sentences.english: The spectrometer has been equipped with an axial plasma torch and a rotary spray chamber.
sentences.chinese: 光譜儀配有端視等離子體炬和旋流霧室進樣裝置。

sentences.english: One is a spectrometer that measures sunlight reflected from the Earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 一個是光譜儀，它測量從地球表面反射的陽光。

sentences.english: A mini-spectrometer that applied to computer color match system is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種應用於電腦配色系統的小型光譜儀。

sentences.english: The experimental parameters of spectrograph for high resolution (HR) spectroscopy are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了高分辨率光譜實驗的光譜儀參數。

sentences.english: The electronic systems for the spectrometers will be produced in Oregon by Avicenna Instruments, the researchers said.
sentences.chinese: 該光譜儀的電子系統將由在美國的俄勒岡州生產。

sentences.english: Optical flux is an important parameter of polarization interference spectrometer.
sentences.chinese: 光通量是偏振干涉成像光譜儀的關鍵參量之一。

sentences.english: Our products include single- and dual-beam spectrographs.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品包括單射線和雙射線的光譜儀。

sentences.english: This can be done with the future spectrographs.
sentences.chinese: 這可用未來光譜儀觀測到。

sentences.english: The spectrograph used is model 247 grating incidence spectrograph.
sentences.chinese: 所用光譜儀如247型掠入射真空紫外攝譜儀。

sentences.english: We use the multi-wavelength solar spectrograph of the Purple Mountain Observatory to observe the spectra of solar flares.
sentences.chinese: 我們用紫臺多波段太陽光譜儀進行耀斑光譜觀測。

sentences.english: This paper introduces briefly the new solar spectrograph at Pic du Midi.
sentences.chinese: 本文扼要介紹了日中峯天文臺新的太陽光譜儀。

sentences.english: Determine carboxyl content with Fourier infrared spectrum instrument.
sentences.chinese: 用傅立葉紅外光譜儀測定羧基含量。
